name: Animal Dash!
description:
That nasty Chef is at it again! Help the animals jump and dash their way to freedom, and collect as much fruit as you can on the way!

Why get Animal Dash?
- Kid safe fun!
- Adult safe fun!
- Limitless adventures
- Heaps of achievements
- 15 playable animals
- Lots of upgrades and bonuses
- Multiple themes


So don't be such a boar and stop lion around. It'll bear-ly take any effort, crab a copy today!
